# repeat

<!-- Generated by swift-argument-parser -->

```
repeat [--count=<count>] [--include-counter] <phrase> [--help]
```

**--count=\<count\>:**

*The number of times to repeat 'phrase'.*


**--include-counter:**

*Include a counter with each repetition.*


**phrase:**

*The phrase to repeat.*


**--help:**

*Show help information.*
